Tomorrow at 11am I'm blowing the roof off of Birrarung Marr park in Melbourne. I know parks don't have roofs, but you get the idea.
Another amazing day in Australia. I hope you're ready, Melbourne. This Tuesday I wanna meet every one of ya. Make sure you get there early!
